titleStmt.title: The Ivry of inqvisition de jvre divino vvhether by divine right it is lawfvll to inflict punishment vpon the offending lordly bishops, yea, or no.

notesStmt.note: Item at reel 1637:3 is an improved copy over the incomplete copy at reel 1012:18, which lacks t.p.
Reproduction of originals in the Huntington Library.
